trans-unit.source: Provides a validation summary adapter class for the HTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 HTML 介面卡集合中的驗證摘要的配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlValidationSummaryAdapter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回相關聯控制項的強型別的參考。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯控制項的強型別的參考。

trans-unit.source: Called after an object, such as a form or a page, is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的物件後，例如表單或頁面中，會初始化。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <xref:System.EventArgs>) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 物件 (由<xref:System.EventArgs>)，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*> method to perform rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由控制項呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>方法，用以執行呈現。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收輸出文字寫入器。
